price: 35. „Ir iš tiesų, prakeiksmas tau bus iki Atlygio Dienos (t. y. Prikėlimo Dienos).“
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ ٱللَّعۡنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka al-laʿnata ilā yawmi al-dīni
